Today in South Devon, conditions are poor with 5 ft @7s SSW swell, but fresh 24 mph S winds are making it blown out. Tomorrow looks better with Bantham offering 3 ft @8s WSW and light 6 mph NW winds, making it a clean option. The day after, conditions drop to 2 ft @6s SW with fresh 19 mph SSW winds, keeping it poor across the board. Best: tomorrow.
